materials.raw_text:
Cobalt (Co): 40 g 
 Gallium (Ga): 10 g 
 Scandium (Sc): 40 g 
 Silicon (Si): 30 g

sourcing.instructions:
Cobalt can be sourced from metal suppliers or online retailers specializing in metals. 
 Gallium can be obtained from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 Scandium can be sourced from specialty metal suppliers or through chemical supply companies. 
 Silicon can be purchased from electronics suppliers or chemical vendors.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 40 g of cobalt using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 10 g of gallium and ensure it is in liquid form. 
 3. Weigh 40 g of scandium and keep it in a secure container. 
 4. Measure 30 g of silicon powder. 
 5. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Use a spatula or mixing rod to mix the powders thoroughly until a homogenous mixture is achieved.
